desc.en: 小玉一如往常在竊聽電話時，聽到可疑的業者與老師的交談內容。小玉很擔心，以為老師受暴力犯罪牽連。但老師訂的東西單純只是梅干。
desc.jp: 小玉一如往常在竊聽電話時，聽到可疑的業者與老師的交談內容。小玉很擔心，以為老師受暴力犯罪牽連。但老師訂的東西單純只是梅干。
desc.zh_cn: {cf小玉}一如往常在窃听电话时，听到可疑的业者与老师的交谈内容。{cf小玉}很担心，以为老师受暴力犯罪牵连。但老师订的东西单纯只是梅干。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 無線通信、盗聴

desc.en: 愛瑠邀請老師來到知識解放戰線的圖書館，向老師介紹自己主要的工作空間──圖書館內部的工作室。
desc.jp: 愛瑠邀請老師來到知識解放戰線的圖書館，向老師介紹自己主要的工作空間──圖書館內部的工作室。
desc.zh_cn: 爱瑠邀请老师来到{cn知识解放战线}的图书馆，向老师介绍自己主要的工作空间──图书馆内部的工作室。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

hobby.jp: 漫画を描くこと、妄想

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

hobby.jp: 漫画を描くこと、妄想

name.en: 百夜堂的看板娘是專家！
name.jp: 百夜堂的看板娘是專家！
name.zh_cn: 百夜堂的看板娘是专家！

desc.en: 不知為何，總覺得靜子的狀態很不尋常，結果她就這麼倒下了。[USERNAME]老師對身體狀態不佳卻硬撐的靜子說，偶爾也需要休息一下。於是靜子便要求老師陪在身邊，直到自己睡著。
desc.jp: 不知為何，總覺得靜子的狀態很不尋常，結果她就這麼倒下了。[USERNAME]老師對身體狀態不佳卻硬撐的靜子說，偶爾也需要休息一下。於是靜子便要求老師陪在身邊，直到自己睡著。
desc.zh_cn: 不知为何，总觉得{cf静子}的状态很不寻常，结果她就这么倒下了。[USERNAME]老师对身体状态不佳却硬撑的{cf静子}说，偶尔也需要休息一下。于是{cf静子}便要求老师陪在身边，直到自己睡着。

hobby.en: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch
hobby.jp: 可愛く接客すること、看板娘パンチ
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 可爱地接待客人、看板娘拳

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.jp: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.zh_cn: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上{cf茜香}，就以{et夏莱}的权限查出{cf茜香}的手机发信位置奔赴营救。

desc.en: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.jp: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.zh_cn: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到{cf茜香}的踪迹。{cf白子}立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了{cf茜香}，而之后回来的{cf星野}与老师证明了这一猜测。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.jp: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.zh_cn: 发现了自己被绑走的{cf茜香}深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，{cn对策委员会}五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了{cf茜香}。

desc.en: As Serika is sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee makes their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.jp: As Serika is sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee makes their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf芹香}在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，{cn对策委员会}五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了{cf茜香}。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
